title: Fun game modes for Extra Life 2015 Charity Event

embed.description: Event landing page for Extra Life 2015

body: Would be great if Riot could do something like open up some/all of the fun random game modes for this Charity event. URF, One For All, whatever else. Only needs to be for the weekend 7th-8th November. Great exposure for them too with groups the world over streaming their 24h gaming sessions for this charity event.
